channel.title: Can someone help please? :)
channel.description: i have 2 questions: 1st: how to add commands like: (::yell, ::bank , ::fally ) avaible to all players (wat file is it in?) 2nd: how to change xp per hit I have deltascape source and files like ( charcters, config,notes,data and some java)

item.title: Can someone help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @pawelwoj pawelwoj
item.description:
@pawelwoj wrote:

legend , could you post that 3 codes in the right order please?
and 2 more questions, why if my character-rights are changed to 3 my spec bar isnt full at all the time and
why if i change bank command to rights- 0 it dont work for normal player?
anyway ty for your time

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

To change exp rate go to client.java and do crl f then type TotalExp and click it twice then u find something like doublehit (100) or something change that 100 to wat u want but if u do 100 it will be 200 cause its double

hope i helped =)

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“pawelwoj, post:1, topic:244238”]i have 2 questions:
1st: how to add commands like: (::yell, ::bank , ::fally ) avaible to all players (wat file is it in?)
2nd: how to change xp per hit
I have deltascape source and files like ( charcters, config,notes,data and some java)[/quote]

i have the ::yell --> put above ::message

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 ) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell(playerName +" ~ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

add that obove,

if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights > 0) {
String text = command.substring(7);
yell("[ “+playerName+” ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

i hope i helped :]

Read full topic
